card.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
card.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

card.name: Aqua Madoor
card.description: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

card.name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
card.description: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.

card.name: Battle Ox
card.description: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

card.name: Opticlops
card.description: A one-eyed giant that serves the "Dark Ruler Ha Des", it skewers its enemies with its sharp horn, shattering them to pieces.

card.name: The Dragon Dwelling in the Cave
card.description: A huge dragon dwelling in a cave. It is horrible when it gets angry, although it is usually quiet. It is said to preserve certain treasures.

card.name: Luster Dragon
card.description: A very beautiful dragon covered with sapphire. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.

card.name: X-Head Cannon
card.description: A monster with a mighty cannon barrel, it is able to integrate its attacks. It attacks in many ways by combining and separating with other monsters.

card.name: Mad Dog of Darkness
card.description: He used to be a normal dog who played around in a park, but was corrupted by the powers of darkness.

card.name: Vorse Raider
card.description: This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable, and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

card.name: Alexandrite Dragon
card.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

card.name: Wattaildragon
card.description: Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents.IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.

card.name: Twin-Headed Behemoth
card.description: During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but its ATK/DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Twin-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.

card.name: Yomi Ship
card.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

card.name: Des Feral Imp
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 card in your Graveyard; shuffle that target into the Deck.

card.name: Kaiser Sea Horse
card.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT monster.

card.name: Chaos Necromancer
card.description: The ATK of this card is the number of Monster Cards in your Graveyard x 300.

card.name: Blade Knight
card.description: Gains 400 ATK while you have 1 or less cards in your hand. If you control no other monsters, the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card are negated.

card.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV4
card.description: Control of this face-up card cannot switch. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6
card.description: This card is unaffected by Spell effects. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Cybernetic Cyclopean
card.description: While you have no cards in your hand, this card gains 1000 ATK.

card.name: Puppet Plant
card.description: You can discard this card to the Graveyard, then target 1 Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Des Mosquito
card.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Place 2 counters on it. It gains 500 ATK for each of these counters. If this card would be destroyed by battle, remove 1 of these counters instead.

card.name: Tiger Dragon
card.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing a Dragon monster: You can target up to 2 Set cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; destroy those targets.

card.name: Vanguard of the Dragon
card.description: You can send 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard; this card gains 300 ATK. When this card you control is sent to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect: You can target 1 Dragon-Type Normal Monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

card.name: Divine Dragon Apocralyph
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Dragon-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Interplanetarypurplythorny Dragon
card.description: If a monster you control is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.

card.name: Dark Hole
card.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

card.name: Soul Exchange
card.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that target, as if you controlled it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Tribute to The Doomed
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Rush Recklessly
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Offerings to the Doomed
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy that target, also skip your next Draw Phase.

card.name: Stamping Destruction
card.description: If you control a Dragon monster: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to its controller.

card.name: Enemy Controller
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects.●Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.●Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Burst Stream of Destruction
card.description: If you control "Blue-Eyes White Dragon": Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" you control cannot attack the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Shrink
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; its original ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn.

card.name: Shield Crush
card.description: Target 1 Defense Position monster on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Silent Doom
card.description: Target 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position, but it cannot attack.

card.name: Dragonic Tactics
card.description: Tribute 2 Dragon monsters; Special Summon 1 Level 8 Dragon monster from your Deck.

card.name: Shard of Greed
card.description: Each time you draw a card(s) for your normal draw in your Draw Phase, place 1 Greed Counter on this card. You can send this card with 2 or more Greed Counters to the GY; draw 2 cards.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Sakuretsu Armor
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Shadow Spell
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 700 ATK, also it cannot attack or change its battle position. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

card.name: Widespread Ruin
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy the Attack Position monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (your choice, if tied).

card.name: Threatening Roar
card.description: Your opponent cannot declare an attack this turn.

card.name: Birthright
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

card.name: Damage Gate
card.description: When you take Battle Damage: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard with ATK less than or equal to the amount of damage you took; Special Summon that target.
